item.title: HMm Can someone give me the code
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

Hello, you can use Matrix Incorporated Official Compiler, It compiles from JDK5.0 - 6.0

JDK 1.6.0 - 1.6.0_10

@echo off COLOR 0a cls :menu title Matrix Incorporations Perfect Compiler echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo remember to Visit Matrixinc.co.nr echo This Batch Compiler was created by Matrix Pride, Founder of Matrix Incorporated echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler! if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You must put this compiler in your servers folder for it to Compile correctly echo Please Put the compiler in your servers folder for better results echo If this error Persists, visit matrixinc.co.nr for more support. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid Letter, Be sure to type the EXACT letter options that it gives you echo Please Try Again, If this error persists then contact Matrix Pride at echo matrixinc.co.nr pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7) :checkjavac7 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8) :checkjavac8 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9) :checkjavac9 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10) :checkjavac10 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11) :checkjavac11 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12) :checkjavac12 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac5 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac6 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac7 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac8 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac9 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac10 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac11 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac12 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :javacerror cls title Error echo This Compiler has almost ALL popular JDK's, If you are getting this echo error then it is best that you go to Sun.com and download the latest JDK echo Remember to visit Matrixinc.co.nr !!!!!!!!! pause cls goto menu

Read full topic

item.title: HMm Can someone give me the code
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

What do you mean by the good compiler…???
well i made this when out of boardem one day its just a very simple compiler that has run and compile =P
and basicly work with every version of java past version 6 =P

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0F

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM06
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_06
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo :: go download java…or get up to date lolz
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN09
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_09…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN08
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_08…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN07
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN06
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_06…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN05
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN04
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_04…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN03
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_03…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN02
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_02…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN01
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Thanks for useing this compiler =P have fun
echo ::
echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Zipl0ck for the super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto main[/code]

Read full topic
